Title: Relates to conforming and improving the process for determining incapacity
Summary: Relates to conforming and improving the process for determining incapacity.
LawCode: Amd §§2982 - 2984, 2994-c & 2994-cc, Pub Health L; amd §1750-b, SCPA
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the surrogate's court procedure act, in relation to conforming and improving the process for determining incapacity
